demo.title: NICHQ Vanderbilt Assessment Scale—TEACHER Informant vel

notTrueorHardlyEverTrue.title: Each rating should be considered in the context of what is appropriate for the age of the child you are ratingand should reflect that child’s behavior since the beginning of the school year. Please indicate the number of weeks or months you have been able to evaluate the behaviors:

pleaserespondtoallstatements.title: Is this evaluation based on a time when the child

frightened.title: Fails to give attention to details or makes careless mistakes in schoolwork

difficulty.title: Has difficulty sustaining attention to tasks or activities

listenwhen.title: Does not seem to listen when spoken to directly

hroughoninstructions.title: Does not follow through on instructions and fails to finish schoolwork (not due to oppositional behavior or failure to understand)

activities.title: Has difficulty organizing tasks and activities

reluctant.title: Avoids, dislikes, or is reluctant to engage in tasks that require sustained mental effort

necessary.title: Loses things necessary for tasks or activities (school assignments pencils, or books),

distracted.title: Is easily distracted by extraneous stimuli

fidgets.title: Fidgets with hands or feet or squirms in seat

seatedisexpected.title: Leaves seat in classroom or in other situations in which remaining seated is expected
Runs about or climbs excessively in situations in which remaining seated is expected

difficulty.title: Has difficulty playing or engaging in leisure activities quietly

onthego.title: Is “on the go” or often acts as if “driven by a motor”

answers.title: Blurts out answers before questions have been completed

interrupts.title: Interrupts or intrudes on others (eg, butts into conversations/games)

isangryorresentful.title: Actively defies or refuses to comply with adult’s requests or rules

obtain.title: Lies to obtain goods for favors or to avoid obligations (eg, “cons” others)

itemsofnontrivialvalue.title: Has stolen items of nontrivial value

afraidto.title: Is afraid to try new things for fear of making mistakes

frightenedfo.title: Blames self for problems; feels guilty

lonely.title: Feels lonely, unwanted, or unloved; complains that “no one loves him or her”

inquestionsnineteen.title: Total number of questions scored 2 or 3 in questions 1–9

inquestionsthousand.title: Total number of questions scored 2 or 3 in questions 10–18

inquestionsninehundred.title: Total number of questions scored 2 or 3 in questions 19–28

inquestionstwothousand.title: Total number of questions scored 2 or 3 in questions 29–35

inquestionsthreethousand.title: Total number of questions scored 4 or 5 in questions 36–43
